capabilityDescription.en: Fetches parameters from GCP Secret Manager.  Each secret becomes a Parameter, which can be mapped to a Parameter Group by adding a GCP label named 'group-name'.
capabilityDescription.zh: Fetches parameters from GCP Secret Manager.  Each secret becomes a Parameter, which can be mapped to a Parameter Group by adding a GCP label named 'group-name'.

en.description: A Regular Expression matching on the 'group-name' label value that identifies Secrets whose parameters should be fetched. Any secrets without a 'group-name' label value that matches this Regex will not be fetched.

zh.description: A Regular Expression matching on the 'group-name' label value that identifies Secrets whose parameters should be fetched. Any secrets without a 'group-name' label value that matches this Regex will not be fetched.

en.description: The Controller Service used to obtain Google Cloud Platform credentials.

zh.description: 用于获取Google云平台凭据的控制器服务。
